caption.p:
Selective concentration-dependent effect of chloroxine, ciprofloxacin, nitroxoline, tetracycline, and zinc pyrithione on the growth of diarrheagenic and probiotic bacteria and of 8-hydroxyquinoline on intestinal normal and cancer cells proliferation in vitro. MIC: minimum inhibitory concentration; IC 50: half maximal inhibitory concentration; IC 80: 80% inhibitory concentration of proliferation.
x ¯
-DB: mean MIC for 12 diarrheagenic bacteria,
x ¯
-PB: mean MIC for 9 probiotic bacteria; Caco-2 and HT29: intestinal cancer cells; Fhs74 Int: intestinal normal cells.
